description:
Professional-grade protection for all your outdoor spaces

Experience mosquito-free outdoor living with our most comprehensive mosquito control solution designed for expansive and mosquito-prone yards.

When you have more yard to love (or more mosquitoes than you can handle), you need more protection to match. Our premium plan delivers maximum coverage for complete property protection. We've created the ultimate defense system with extra Mosquito Deleto coverage and professional-grade prevention. Your complete solution arrives before mosquito season begins, ensuring every corner of your property stays protected.

Enjoy approximately 4-6 months* of worry-free protection that renews automatically each year. Wondering if this is the right size for your outdoor space? Take our quiz!

*Protection duration varies based on your climate, pest pressure, and treatment areas.

sections.plan_features_benefits:
Perfect for large properties up to 20,000 sq. ft.
4-8 easy applications for full-season coverage
Plant-based formula that really works
Keeps mosquitoes away for up to 4 weeks per spray
Custom schedule based on your local mosquito season
Proactive prevention strategies for your specific yard
Expert yard advisors on call when you need them
sections.whats_included: 4 Mosquito Deleto Mosquito Sprays for Yards: Lemongrass oil (2%) and cedarwood oil (15%) formula for botanically-derived mosquito control.
sections.instructions:
Check your custom schedule (we time it to your local mosquito season)
Pick a dry, calm day to spray
Connect Mosquito Deleto to your garden hose
Spray mosquito hotspots: shrubs, shady areas, and poor drainage spots
Let everything dry before enjoying your yard
Reapply every 2-4 weeks or after heavy rain
Pro Tip: Divide your property into sections and treat one area at a time for thorough coverage.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
How does the Mosquito Control Subscription work?
It's simple! We ship everything you need for the season before mosquitoes arrive. Your plan renews yearly, so you're always protected. Plus, you get a custom schedule and prevention tips for your specific yard.
How long does each application last?
Your Mosquito Deleto spray keeps working for 2-4 weeks (longer in dry weather). Pro Tip: Create mosquito-free zones around your deck, patio, and play areas first, then work outward for complete coverage.
Can I use this with my Sunday lawn products?
Absolutely! Just apply lawn products first, let them dry, then add your mosquito protection. Your yard will love the combo.
Is this safe for my kids and pets?
Yes! Our botanically-derived formula is tough on mosquitoes but gentle on families and pets. Just let treated areas dry completely before running around outside.
Any state restrictions?
Currently, we can't ship to DC, ID, IN, MD, ME, MS, or MT. We're working on it!
